Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted near Broadway/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Devon, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Broadway/Ardmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #125 Water Tower Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: Southbound  125 Water Tower Express buses are temporarily rerouted : near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #125 Water Tower Express buses are temporarily rerouted : due to,  a Festival near Congress Plaza..

Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, Michigan including the normal route streets , due to a Festival near Congress Plaza.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #37 Sedgwick Reroute near Franklin/Washington
ShortDescription: Northbound 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Madison, Wacker, Orleans over regular route near Franklin/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Madison, Wacker, Orleans over regular route , due to police activity near Franklin/Washington. 

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
